institution-wrap.institution: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

funding-group.funding-statement: This study was funded by the Global Disease Detection initiative of the Center for Global Health, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. Funds for field activities were provided through Cooperative Agreements with the Universidad del Valle de Guatemala (UVG) Centro de Estudios En Salud (1U01GH000028-01 and 1U01GH001003-01). ZM was supported by the Fogarty International Center of the National Institutes of Health (NIH) under Award Number D43TW009343 and the University of California Global Health Institute (UCGHI). The content is solely the responsibility of the authors and does not necessarily represent the official views of the CDC, UVG, NIH, or UCGHI. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
